Package promo

Class PromoController

java.lang.Object
base.BaseController
promo.PromoController
public class PromoController
extends BaseController
Contains the methods to create, update, remove, get and save promotion items.
Since:
2021-04-15
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jordon

  • Method Details

    • createPromo

      public static void createPromo​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, double price) throws EmptyFieldException, NegativeNumberException, FailReadException, FailWriteException
      Creates a promotion item and saves it in the promotion file.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the promotion item.
      description - Description of the promotion item.
      price - Price of the promotion item.
      Throws:
      EmptyFieldException - If the user leaves the name of the promotion item blank.
      NegativeNumberException - If the user enters a negative number for the price of the item.
      FailReadException - If the promotion file cannot be read.
      FailWriteException - If the created promotion item cannot be written into the promotion file.

    • updatePromoInfo

      public static void updatePromoInfo​(int promoId, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String price) throws EmptyFieldException, NegativeNumberException, java.lang.NumberFormatException, PromoNotFoundException, FailReadException, FailWriteException
      Updates a promotion item and saves it in the promotion file.
      Parameters:
      promoId - ID of the promotion item.
      name - Name of the promotion item.
      description - Description of the promotion item.
      price - Price of the promotion item.
      Throws:
      EmptyFieldException - If the user leaves the name of the promotion item blank.
      NegativeNumberException - If the user enters a negative number for the price of the item.
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - If the user enters an invalid input for the price of the promotion item.
      PromoNotFoundException - If the promotion item does not exist.
      FailReadException - If the promotion file cannot be read.
      FailWriteException - If the promotion item cannot be written into the promotion file.

    • addMenu

      public static void addMenu​(int promoId, int menuId) throws MenuNotFound, MenuAlreadyExistsException, FailReadException, PromoNotFoundException, FailWriteException
      Adds menu items into the promotion item and saves the promotion file.
      Parameters:
      promoId - ID of the promotion item.
      menuId - ID of the menu item.
      Throws:
      MenuNotFound - If the menu item does not exist.
      MenuAlreadyExistsException - If the menu item already exists in the promotion item.
      FailReadException - If the promotion or menu files cannot be read.
      PromoNotFoundException - If the promotion item does not exist.
      FailWriteException - If the promotion item cannot be written into the promotion file.

    • removeMenu

      public static void removeMenu​(int promoId, int menuId) throws NoMenuException, FailReadException, FailWriteException, PromoNotFoundException
      Removes menu items from the promotion item and saves the promotion file.
      Parameters:
      promoId - ID of the promotion item.
      menuId - ID of the menu item.
      Throws:
      NoMenuException - If the menu item does not exist in the promotion item.
      FailReadException - If the promotion file cannot be read.
      FailWriteException - If the promotion item cannot be written into the promotion file.
      PromoNotFoundException - If the promotion item does not exist.

    • removePromo

      public static void removePromo​(int promoId) throws PromoNotFoundException, FailReadException, FailWriteException
      Removes a promotion item and saves the promotion file.
      Parameters:
      promoId - ID of the promotion item.
      Throws:
      PromoNotFoundException - If the promotion item does not exist.
      FailReadException - If the promotion file cannot be read.
      FailWriteException - If the promotion item cannot be written into the promotion file.

    • isMenuInPromo

      public static boolean isMenuInPromo​(Promo promo, Menu menu)
      Checks if the menu item exists in the promotion item.
      Parameters:
      promo - Promotion item to be checked.
      menu - Menu item to be found.
      Returns:
      True if the menu item exists in the promotion item. Else, false.

    • retrievePromo

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Promo> retrievePromo() throws FailReadException
      Gets an ArrayList of promotion items.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of promotion items.
      Throws:
      FailReadException - If the promotion file cannot be read.

    • savePromoToFile

      private static void savePromoToFile​(java.util.ArrayList<Promo> promoItems) throws FailWriteException
      Saves changes made to the promotion items in the promotion file.
      Parameters:
      promoItems - ArrayList of promotion items.
      Throws:
      FailWriteException - If a promotion item cannot be written into the promotion file.
